title: Limited LP Gas distribution today (7)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st): Limited domestic LP Gas (12.5 kg, 5kg & 2.3kg) distribution will be in effect for Colombo and Gampaha areas on Tuesday (7), said Litro Gas.
